title: Magic Face O2-Moon
summary: Pure material design watch face, minimal & elegant. Multi-interactive functions！
description: Magic Interactive face support all Android Wear watches !Tap on the indicator of Step or Weather, more information will show up.Features:Pure material design.Creative and elegant watchface.Multi-interactive functions.Steps-Weather-watch batteryInteractive functions：Steps:1:New clear, uncluttered designed personal step-info center.2:Weekly step curve tell how much you have done in past 6 days with current step and distance info .3:Curve color could be changed daily from low red to high green which depends on if your actual steps reach to the goal or not. 4:Swipe down the page to check your whole activity history.Weather:1:Current Weather info page with details of coming days2:Swipe down the page to get Weather forecast for 16 days !Watch battery:1: Watch battery infoMoon river, wider than a mile,Two drifters, off to see the world. There's such a lot of world to see.When you listen to this song and tap on the face. What you could image it ?The moonlight glimmers on surface of the sea. Peace, beautiful and ? Magic face O2 Moon is special. Pure material design with smoothly interactive animation just make you feel fascinatedMore facesIf you like Moon, feel free to try our new watchface platform Magic Watchface, all the original faces created by Magic team are here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platformYou can also search magic face on Google Play to find more of our works.Supported Devices:Face Moon supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.Note:Please rate us positive if you like our work.Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.comSeeing more details please refer the below “Contact us”Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately. Tips:✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)✔ If the face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).2. Uninstall the face.3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.4. Finally install the face and select “resync apps”in settingsAttention:- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.Contact us:If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:magicwatchface@gmail.comOr join our community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809Web:http://www.magicwatchface.com/Twitter：https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface Thank you for :We really appreciate for you downloading our app. We look forward to adding to our free & premium Magic Watchface line.
descriptionHTML:
Magic Interactive face support all Android Wear watches !
Tap on the indicator of Step or Weather, more information will show up.

Features:

Pure material design.
Creative and elegant watchface.
Multi-interactive functions.
Steps-Weather-watch battery

Interactive functions：

Steps:
1:New clear, uncluttered designed personal step-info center.
2:Weekly step curve tell how much you have done in past 6 days with current step and distance info .
3:Curve color could be changed daily from low red to high green which depends on if your actual steps reach to the goal or not.
4:Swipe down the page to check your whole activity history.

Weather:
1:Current Weather info page with details of coming days
2:Swipe down the page to get Weather forecast for 16 days !

Watch battery:
1: Watch battery info

Moon river, wider than a mile,Two drifters, off to see the world. There's such a lot of world to see.When you listen to this song and tap on the face. What you could image it ?The moonlight glimmers on surface of the sea. Peace, beautiful and ?

Magic face O2 Moon is special. Pure material design with smoothly interactive animation just make you feel fascinated

More faces
If you like Moon, feel free to try our new watchface platform Magic Watchface, all the original faces created by Magic team are here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platform
You can also search magic face on Google Play to find more of our works.


Supported Devices:

Face Moon supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.

Note:

Please rate us positive if you like our work.

Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.

Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.com
Seeing more details please refer the below “Contact us”

Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately.


Tips:

✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)
✔ If the face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:

1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).
2. Uninstall the face.
3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.
4. Finally install the face and select “resync apps”in settings

Attention:

- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.

Contact us:
If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:
magicwatchface@gmail.com

Or join our community:
https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809

Web:
http://www.magicwatchface.com/

Twitter：
https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface


Thank you for :
We really appreciate for you downloading our app. We look forward to adding to our free & premium Magic Watchface line.
comments: This watch face is beautiful to look at and is exactly what I was looking for. However, I wish it had settings either built into the watch face or as a separate app. There is no option for 12 hour time, any additional options or settings for shortcuts, and the weather information is inaccurate for my location and lacking Fahrenheit measurement.
